doc.previous: Urticaria is a vascular reaction of the skin characterized by the appearance of wheals which are firm elevated swelling of the skin 102 Angioedema which can occur alone or with urticaria is characterized by a well defined edematous swelling that involves subcutaneous tissues abdominal organs and or upper airway 103
